descriptionlist.description:
Spin Settings for iOS 11!
Spin Settings was an amazing tweak in the good old days of iOS 9 and I had sorely missed it until i got the idea to update it for iOS 11.

Enjoy!

Credits:
reddit user u/theperra for laying the ground work for the tweak, and @thepandoconnection for ironing everything out.

changelog.change: updated for iOS 11, more to come
